ygData.subject: Re: A little spark...
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Maximal sparks are created with energy drawn from the Matrix. Predacon sparks are created from energy drawn from the pit. Matrix energy conflicts with Pit

OOC: Maximal sparks are created with energy drawn from the Matrix. 
Predacon sparks are created from energy drawn from the pit. Matrix 
energy conflicts with Pit energy. Just as Chaochitan energy(the 
energy Infecticons are created from) conflicts with both of those and 
vice versa. Each used on the other has devestating effects. However 
vey few robots have the ability to draw dimension from any of the 
dimensions. Iron Raptor and Liono Prime are the only two I know of 
that can draw Matrix Energy other then Zero. And the Infecticon 
Enforcers are the only chars that can draw energy from the 
Chaochitan. There are no Pit energy drawing preds in this RPG thus 
far...
